item.title: Recommended Browser Plugins
item.description: Note: The only daily-driver browser I recommend is FireFox. Alternatively you should be using the TOR Browser. Do not install plugins in the TOR browser. U-Block Origin - Prefered - A great Open-Source AD blocker. HTTPS Everywhere - Prefered - Forces your browser to load sites over HTTPS rather than HTTP Decentraleyes - Local CDN Emulator ClearURLs - Dynamically removes tracking tags from links CanvasBlocker - Prevents JavaScript Fingerprinting Multi Account Containers - Allows for isolated brower sessions Terms of Service, Didn’t Read - Informs user of shady ToS Bitwarden - Secure Open-Source Cloud Password Manager Privacy Badger - Learns and blocks trackers

item.title: Recommended Every Day Carry (EDC)
item.description: The typical every day carry (EDC) consists of a few basic tools. Typically, they are a knife or blade, a flashlight, a watch, and a pen. I’ll recommend a few in different price points within their categories with a few extras below. item.description: Free resources: Cisco - Learn Cisco for free! (Some Paid) CodeAcademy - Learn Python, C#, C++, HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and more for free!
